name: Osaka 2049
description:
It is recommended to play the downloadable EXE, as WebGL randomly butchers my games

The year 2049 has arrived.A herd of fuckin' annoying streamer idol holograms are rushing from Osaka.

Crime rate skyrocketed! Osaka is ruined! Therefore, The Osaka government called Keanu Reeves's relative "Reanu Keeves" for the massacre of the holograms. Reanu is a killer machine. Wipe out all 2.691 million of the annoying holograms!
